workout_groups.name: Hypertrophy Bodybuilding Routine
workout_groups.description: A muscle-growth-focused workout using moderate weights and high reps to maximize hypertrophy.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
workouts.description: Press dumbbells while keeping a controlled tempo for optimal muscle activation.

workouts.name: Seated Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Use dumbbells or a barbell to press overhead, focusing on controlled movement.

workouts.name: Barbell Squats
workouts.description: Perform controlled squats to build lower body size and strength.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldown
workouts.description: Engage the lats fully by pulling down with a slow, controlled motion.

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.description: Perform controlled reps to target the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
workouts.description: Lift dumbbells to the side, keeping arms slightly bent for full deltoid activation.

workouts.name: Bicep Curls
workouts.description: Focus on controlled movement to maximize bicep contraction.

workout_groups.name: Strength & Size Hybrid Routine
workout_groups.description: Combining strength training and muscle-building techniques for maximum growth and power.

workouts.name: Barbell Deadlift
workouts.description: Lift heavy with proper form to build posterior chain strength and size.

workouts.name: Incline Barbell Press
workouts.description: Press at an incline to target the upper chest and anterior delts.

workouts.name: Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Engage lats and biceps in strict pull-ups for back and arm hypertrophy.

workouts.name: Hack Squats
workouts.description: Use a hack squat machine to isolate the quadriceps.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squats
workouts.description: Increase leg strength and stability by focusing on one leg at a time.

workouts.name: Seated Calf Raises
workouts.description: Focus on slow, controlled reps to build the calves effectively.

workouts.name: Weighted Dips
workouts.description: Use bodyweight or added weight to target the chest, triceps, and shoulders.

workout_groups.name: Bodybuilding Split Routine
workout_groups.description: A traditional bodybuilding split routine focusing on hypertrophy and muscle isolation.

workouts.name: Chest and Triceps
workouts.description: Focus on chest and triceps with exercises like bench press and tricep extensions.

workouts.name: Back and Biceps
workouts.description: Focus on back and biceps with exercises like pull-ups and bicep curls.

workouts.name: Legs and Shoulders
workouts.description: Focus on legs and shoulders with exercises like squats and shoulder presses.

workout_groups.name: Super Bodybuilding Routine
workout_groups.description: An advanced muscle-building program designed for elite lifters looking for maximum hypertrophy and strength.

workouts.name: Deficit Deadlifts
workouts.description: Perform deadlifts from an elevated platform to increase range of motion.

workouts.name: Floor Press
workouts.description: A partial-range bench press focusing on lockout strength.

workouts.name: Front Squats
workouts.description: Requires extreme core engagement and quad activation.

workouts.name: Overhead Squats
workouts.description: One of the most demanding exercises, requiring mobility, core strength, and balance.

workouts.name: Nordic Hamstring Curls
workouts.description: A brutal but effective hamstring builder using eccentric control.

workouts.name: Sissy Squats
workouts.description: A bodyweight movement that isolates the quadriceps in extreme knee flexion.

workouts.name: One-Arm Weighted Pull-Ups
workouts.description: An extreme lat and bicep exercise requiring full-body control.
